metadata.synopsis: Harper Scout's default dialogue through several states in Haven.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. DebugBook > Goto Region: Act 2 > ShadowCurseLands > Mountain Pass Entry. 2. Goto 57.566; 42.958; 134.4213. Agree to help fight the shadow creatures4. reCon killCombat5. Agree to follow them to Haven6. At CheckPoint Cinematic, press choice 1 all the way.7. Follow Harper Karrow all the way to a small makeshift altar8. Talk to her to trigger dialogue

0.speaker: Harper Karrow
0.text: We lost a good one today. Yonas. He was green as they come, poor kid.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Reflecting on a dead soldier

2.speaker: Harper Karrow
2.text: Gods above, what a forsaken place.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.

3.speaker: Harper Karrow
3.text: This might be the only peaceful spot for a league.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

4.speaker: Harper Karrow
4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

5.speaker: Harper Karrow
5.text: I thought we were safe here. More fool me.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

6.speaker: Harper Karrow
6.text: You've proven yourself a powerful ally. It's an honour to fight beside you.

7.speaker: Harper Karrow
7.text: Thanks to you we've got a chance to fight back. We'll make it count.

8.speaker: Harper Karrow
8.text: Poor Yonas. Kid was as green as they come.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Reflecting on a dead soldier

9.speaker: Harper Karrow
9.text: Keep your eyes sharp. Anyone could be a traitor.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

10.speaker: Harper Karrow
10.text: We survived one attack. Not sure we'd survive a second.
